headline: Is BlackRock (BLK) Pricing Look Stretched After Strong Multi Year Share Gains?
summary: If you are wondering whether BlackRock's current share price still makes sense for long term investors, you need to look closely at what the numbers say about its underlying value. The stock last closed at US$1,076.16, with returns of 8.3% over 1 year, 58.5% over 3 years, and 67.8% over 5 years, despite softer moves in the near term with a 4.1% decline over 7 days, a 3.9% decline over 30 days, and a 0.8% decline year to date. Recent attention on BlackRock has centered on its role as one of...

headline: How Crypto ETFs Could Make the Bitcoin Selloff Even Worse
summary: For the past two years, exchange-traded funds have been one of the best things to happen to Bitcoin.  Bitcoin ETFs have been a huge hit with investors, collecting nearly $60 billion since early 2024.  All that new demand helped push Bitcoin’s price from $44,000 in January 2024 to a record high of more than $126,000 on Oct. 6, 2025.

raw.headline: How Crypto ETFs Could Make the Bitcoin Selloff Even Worse
raw.summary: For the past two years, exchange-traded funds have been one of the best things to happen to Bitcoin.  Bitcoin ETFs have been a huge hit with investors, collecting nearly $60 billion since early 2024.  All that new demand helped push Bitcoin’s price from $44,000 in January 2024 to a record high of more than $126,000 on Oct. 6, 2025.

headline: Dynasty Financial Partners Closes Minority Capital Raise
summary: ST. PETERSBURG, Fla., February 05, 2026--Dynasty Financial Partners today announced the successful closure of a minority capital raise supported by its community of stakeholders including its employees, clients, and resource partners, as well as several of its long-standing investors and members of its Board of Directors. headline: BlackRock Aladdin Drives Private Markets Transparency By Unifying Pre- and Post-Investment Tech On A Single Platform
summary: NEW YORK, February 05, 2026--BlackRock Aladdin has integrated Preqin’s extensive data and technology into its eFront® platform for private markets investors, creating a comprehensive, data-driven private asset management technology solution. In eFront, institutional clients can now manage their full investment lifecycle in one place, with detailed market context via Preqin data. headline: CNBC Daily Open: Alphabet could more than double its capex in 2026, unsettling investors

headline: Why Asia's richest man and BlackRock CEO want Indians to pick equities over gold
